text: The Romanian royal family is the group who are relatives (family) of the monarch, or in this case, the head of the house, currently Margareta of Romania, ==Members== * Margareta of Romania and Prince Radu * Princess Elena of Romania and The Hon. Alexander Nixon * Princess Irina of Romania * Princess Sophie of Romania * Princess Maria of Romania ==References== *Official Website of the Romanian Royal Family Category:Romanian people
title: Romanian royal family
